data.event: City Point, the oldest part of Hopewell, was established in 1613 by Sir Thomas Dale.

event.title: were established in the Colony of Virginia in 1634

data.event: "Charles City Point" was in Charles City Shire when the first eight shires were established in the Colony of Virginia in 1634.

event.title: known as Charles City County in 1637

data.event: Charles City Shire soon became known as Charles City County in 1637.
